actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that pensions paid to volunteer firemen or their dependents, or to the widows or other survivors of deceased volunteer firemen, shall not be subject to the income tax.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, that pensions paid to volunteer firemen or their dependents, or to the widows or other survivors of deceased volunteer firemen, shall not be subject to the income tax provisions of the Code. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 124)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that pensions paid to volunteer firemen or their dependents, or to the widows or other survivors of deceased volunteer firemen, shall not be subject to the income tax.
